response.summary: Colaborative, dedicated Civil Engineer with 8 years of experience, focused on managing large-scale construction endeavors as a construction project manager, with a solid knowledge and skills in construction, installation, and commissioning of engineering services. Possesses excellent interpersonal skills enabling to integrate and lead teams, as well as build strong relationships with clients and stakeholders at all levels of the business. Committed, adaptable, and results-oriented professional that believes effective planning, clear communication, and adaptability are essential components of success in managing projects. His customer-oriented approach and ability to understand their needs allow him to provide innovative solutions and adapt to market changes, assisting organizations in achieving their goals.
response.skills: Liderazgo, Gestión de contratos, Aprovisionamiento, Control de costes, Negociación de contratos, Earthworks, Project Metrics, Project Implementation, Team Motivation, Communication, Planificación estratégica, Scrum, Evaluación de riesgos, Aseguramiento de la calidad, Construction Management

profile_positions.description: Robust background in the realm of construction project coordination, specializing in foundations and large building projects.  Expertise in team coordination, client and stakeholder relations, budget management, and risk mitigation.
profile_positions.title: Responsable de Obra

company.name: Soletanche-Bachy Colombia
company.description:
Soletanche Bachy Colombia es el trabajo autónomo y a su vez colaborativo, de 5 marcas que ponen en marcha todo su conocimiento y experiencia en ingeniería especializada y geotecnia para brindar soluciones innovadoras en cada proyecto y así construir las bases firmes del mañana.

- SOLETANCHE BACHY CIMAS: Infraestructura
- GEO: Edificaciones y mejoramiento de suelos 
- PREFA: Prefabricados 
- BESSAC ANDINA: Túneles, microtúneles y redes subterráneas
